titles.title: We are on the winning side

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We are on the winning side
Winning side, winning side
We are on the winning side
Winning all the time

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Winning side (3x)
Winning side (3x)
Winning side (3x)
Winning all the time!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Satan's on the losing side
Losing side, losing side
Satan's on the losing side
Losing all the time

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Losing side (3x)
Losing side (3x)
Losing side (3x)
Losing all the time!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Jesus is the winner man, winner
man, winner man
Jesus is the winner man, winning
all the time

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Winner man (3x)
Winner man (3x)
Winner man (3x)
Winning all the time!

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Satan is the loser man,
loser man, loser man
Satan is the loser man,
Losing all the time

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Loser man (3x)
Loser man (3x)
Loser man (3x)
Losing all the time
